answers.answer: Hi, how old are you and are suffering from diabetes or hypertension? Tingling sensations could be due to neuropathy, may be associated with occipital nerve.Try anti inflammatory drugs, vitamin B preparations and cold compression for 4-5 days.

Hi, i am 23 years old and my lower left side of my face tingles. around my lip. also i feel like spasms in my left side of my head on top of my ear, i had an mri and came back ok, my mri was done when i was 18 i am very comfused and lost. i have not been checked for diabetes, but was treated for hypertension when i was a young kid. also what is occipital nerve?

How is this info? I am 59 years old and started having T.I.A. symptoms 6-8 months ago. I have had every test you can imagine, C.T., MRI, Cerebral angiogram, Blood work, ambulatory EEG which showed muscle spasms in several of my blood vessels in the brain. The doctor has put me on Depokote 3-4 weeks ago and I am still having siezure like symptoms (which I failed to mention in the beginning). I am ready to call the Fox network and ask them to put this situation on "House" so they can fiqure it out! Is anyone having anything similiar happening?

title: right rear brain tingling
